title: Tragedy or triumph
creator_credit: Krishna Singh, Edward Magruder Jones and United Nations Television
brief_description: At the World Food Conference in 1974, the international community assessed the dimensions of the world food crisis and attempted to mobilise support for specific programs to head off disaster. The film surveys the causes of the present world food situation and identifies some of the measures which could increase food production.
